display_long_description:
# Punch Bomb
is a fast-paced 360° action arcade game where you punch bombs away before they explode.

Built for those who love a challenge.

Climb the global leaderboards across 3 punchable game modes!

👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊

# Classic Mode
Survive as long as you can! Punch a variety of bombs away from you before they explode, dodge dangerous laser obstacles, hit targets, and rack up huge combos.
[media]


👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊

# Blitz Mode

Race against the clock to get a high score within the time limit! Bombs no longer explode, and targets extend your time. 
[media]

👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊

# Challenge Mode
Complete a fun collection of challenges that put your speed and accuracy to the test!
[media]

👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊

# Unique Cosmetics
Unlock unique cosmetics by **playing the game** and mastering its challenges. Each cosmetic has its own visual flair!




[media]
